name: LOTUS-Simulator
description: For the first time, bus, tram and train are simulated extremely realistic in a single game – and you can drive them, build them or create the world around. LOTUS – simulation will never be the same!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7, 8, 10 Процессор: 2,6 GHz, 4 cores Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 512 MB VRAM Место на диске: 5 GB Дополнительно: OpenGL 3.3
